unnormalised: Athlete biographies are my go-to! Recently read about Mithali Raj - what an inspiration! Remember watching "Chak De! India" and wishing for more stories like hers. Are there any on kabaddi players, especially from Pro Kabaddi League? Maybe someone from Patna Pirates? Would love to read about their journey from small towns in Bihar to the big leagues. Also, any recommendations on P.T. Usha?
